name: Beam Dreamer
description:
Why do you keep having this dream? 

It doesn't matter. You're having it again. 

What level will you reach before waking up? 

HOW TO PLAY: 

Auto-pilot is enabled on your ship. It flies and shoots laser beams by itself. 

Click or Tap on the character portrait to access the menu. 

  • POWER increases the strength of your laser beams and bombs.
  • SPEED increases your rate of fire, shield time and horizontal evasion. 
  • HP increases your total HP to the amount shown. 
  • BOMB fires a single missile. (5 second cooldown)
  • SHIELD neutralizes enemy attacks while active. (cooldown scales with SPEED)
  • +HP heals your total HP by roughly the amount shown. (scales with HP)
